1.name: Uplifting Current
1.desc: When Soukaku triggers <ct color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Blade Banner</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability: Group Set Meal</ct>, the buff duration is increased by 8s.

flavor.0: When charged, the special charging module can generate a wind current of Ether energy to charge surrounding Ether devices.
flavor.1: To Soukaku, it's just like having a buffet with friends.

desc.0: When Soukaku's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct> hits an enemy, there's a 15% chance she gains 1 stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vortex</ct>, triggering up to once per second.
desc.1: When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vortex</ct> reaches max stacks, any additional stacks grant Soukaku 1.2 Energy instead.

flavor.0: A charging module is able to continuously accumulate energy during battle.
flavor.1: Therefore, it is regarded as an era-defining conceptual tactical weapon by the R&D department.
flavor.2: But for Soukaku, fully charging it simply means it's time to eat.

3.name: Attendance Meal Allowance
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2
3.flavor: The best way to motivate Soukaku to train harder is simple: just increase her attendance meal allowance.

4.name: Hypothermia
4.desc: If an enemy is hit by <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fly the Flag</ct>, the target's <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice RES</ct> is reduced by 10% for 8s.
4.flavor: The custom-made weapon Oni Banner features a powerful built-in cooling system. Its Ether-infused catalyst generates cold air, dealing significant DMG to enemies it hits.

5.name: Late-Night Snacks
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2
5.flavor: To further incentivize Soukaku to train is simple: just add a late-night snack top of the attendance meal allowance.

6.name: Northern Wind
6.desc: While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Frosted Banner</ct> state, the number of usable enhanced <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</ct> and enhanced <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attacks</ct> is increased to 12, and also deal 45% more DMG.
6.flavor: Unlocking the safety device within the blade banner allows it to operate at full capacity. It's not just for combat... it's also handy for cooling down a meal.
